metadata.title: CVE-2018-5109 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An audio capture session can started under an incorrect origin from thesite making the capture request. Users are still prompted to allow therequest but the prompt can display the wrong origin, leading to userconfusion about which site is making the request to capture an audiostream. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 58.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5109` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
firefox-globalmenu - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
firefox-mozsymbols - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
firefox-testsuite - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1').
